The total number of dining seats has nearly doubled in the past two years due in large part to the opening of Grace Dodge Dining Hall

Two years ago, there were 697 permanent seats across three dining locations: John Jay Dining Hall, Ferris Booth Commons, and JJ’s Place. With the opening of five new locations, 588 seats have been added, 264 of those from Grace Dodge Dining Hall alone.

= 20 dining seats

In the 2021-22 academic year, the seat to student ratio was 1:9.

Now in the 2023-24 academic year, the seat to student ratio is 1:6.

Source: Columbia Dining

Graphic by Ana Pekec
